name: Chained Escape
summary:
⛓️ Linked by Chains, Bound by Fate ⛓️
"Chained Escape" is an immersive VR game where players control penguins chained together, striving to reach the summit. Supporting multiplayer for up to 4 players, you'll need teamwork and strategy—sometimes helping each other, sometimes causing chaos—as you race to clear the game before your energy runs out!

💪 Master the Physics-Based Chain Mechanics 💪

Use realistic physics to manipulate chains and control your movement as well as your teammates'. Rescue...
